metadataAttributes.title: P7.1 The entity collects and maintains accurate, up-to-date, complete, and relevant personal information to meet the entityâ€™s objectives related to privacy
metadataAttributes.summary: Ensures Accuracy and Completeness of Personal Information - Personal information is accurate and complete for the purposes for which it is to be used. Ensures Relevance of Personal Information - Personal information is relevant to the purposes for which it is to be used.
